title: Top 675 Hip-Hop & Rap Songs of All Time
description:
The Top 675 Hip-Hop/Rap Songs of All-Time:

Here is my final attempt at putting together the perfect hip-hop collection. First off let me throw the disclaimer out there: I am a hip-hop enthusiast, not an expert... so of course there will be some omissions BUT give credit where its due and respect all the hours I put into this. 

I am a 21-year old east coast hip-hop head, and as I am growing older and more disillusioned with the current state of hip hop I began to dig deeper into its history. The past few months i have been researching other hip-hop collections, best-ofs, and top lists, and using Wikipedia to learn about a lot of great hip hop groups. As I was growing my own personal collection, I started picking out the definitive classic joints and beloved favorites. 

Within this collection I feel I have taken a slice of the best material from each region- East coast, west coast, down south, mid-west, etc., as well as from old-school, to golden age, to contemporary eras. So keep in mind all the work that went into this, and the simple fact that it is pretty damn challenging to put together a good representative torrent that covers an entire culture, 25+ years of music, and an entire country! 

I appreciate your thoughts, so go ahead and drop a comment!



Enjoy~



-Xeb




The Top 675 Hip-Hop/Rap Songs of All-Time:
